about.title: About Cotanak
about.subtitle: Premium Edible Oils Since 1985
about.description: Cotanak has been a trusted name in premium edible oils for over three decades. As part of the Altas Group, we are committed to bringing you the finest quality oils that enhance both the flavor and nutritional value of your meals.
about.mission: To provide healthy, natural, and premium quality edible oils that promote well-being and add exceptional taste to every dish.
about.vision: To be the leading provider of premium edible oils, recognized for our commitment to quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction.

values.title: Quality First
values.description: We never compromise on quality, ensuring every bottle meets the highest standards.

values.title: Natural & Pure
values.description: Our oils are minimally processed to retain their natural goodness.

values.title: Sustainability
values.description: We work with sustainable farming practices to protect our environment.

values.title: Customer Focus
values.description: Your satisfaction and health are at the heart of everything we do.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
